title: JAM / faln sneakers on a pedestal of speakers

dialogueTree.title: A Pedestal of Speakers: "Only the speakers remain, dusty and..."
dialogueTree.text: Only the speakers remain, dusty and forgotten...

links.title: You: "Inspect the sneakers."
links.text: Inspect the sneakers.

links.title: FALN Sneakers on a Pedestal of Speakers: "A pair of FALN 'Ultras.' The design..."
links.text: A pair of FALN 'Ultras.' The design is impossibly sleek and simple -- a futuristic silhouette with a sleek monochrome colourway, a jet black upper, and a silver-lined midsole.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Dedicated! Victorious! Sporty! Thes..."
links.text: Dedicated! Victorious! Sporty! These *FALN* sneakers are a must-have for a track-and-field legend.

links.title: Siileng: ""Those sneakers, mister..." the str..."
links.text: "Those sneakers, mister..." the street vendor intones. "Those sneakers are the latest FALN sneakers. Super-rare, super-fine, super-cool -- only 50 re√°l!"

links.title: Rhetoric: "Only?! That's madness."
links.text: Only?! That's madness.

links.title: Conceptualization: "*FALN "Ultra" -- wear the future!*..."
links.text: *FALN "Ultra" -- wear the future!* You remember the slogan from some magazine...

links.title: You: "Inspect the speakers."
links.text: Inspect the speakers.

links.title: A Pedestal of Speakers: "These once-mighty speakers have bee..."
links.text: These once-mighty speakers have been conquered, reduced to a mere prop by the indomitable FALN 'Ultras' that used to crown them.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "A small heat emboss on the veneer r..."
links.text: A small heat emboss on the veneer reads: "Solidarity Aid from the People's Republic of Samara." The speakers themselves don't seem to display any magical qualities.

links.title: Siileng: ""No-no, don't look at the speakers,..."
links.text: "No-no, don't look at the speakers, officer! Look at the *sneakers*!" The man points to the footwear. "The *sneakers* are the stars here!"

links.title: You: ""Okay, I'll look at the sneakers, t..."
links.text: "Okay, I'll look at the sneakers, then."

links.title: Siileng: ""Good move, officer. You won't find..."
links.text: "Good move, officer. You won't find a deal like this anywhere."

links.title: You: ""But I already looked at the sneake..."
links.text: "But I already looked at the sneakers."

links.title: Siileng: ""Then look at them again! These are..."
links.text: "Then look at them again! These are premium lifestyle sneakers, officer -- the best on the market!"

links.title: You: ""But I already *bought* the sneaker..."
links.text: "But I already *bought* the sneakers."

links.title: Siileng: ""So you did! Now put them on and lo..."
links.text: "So you did! Now put them on and look at them, officer! Make the people jealous of your premium lifestyle!"

links.title: You: ""But I'm already wearing them." (Po..."
links.text: "But I'm already wearing them." (Point to the sneakers.)

links.title: Siileng: ""That you are, officer," the street..."
links.text: "That you are, officer," the street vendor says. "Stupid me! Go forth and live that premium lifestyle!"

links.title: You: "Contemplate your sneakers in total..."
links.text: Contemplate your sneakers in total silence.

links.title: Siileng: ""Oh," he exclaims, appearing to wip..."
links.text: "Oh," he exclaims, appearing to wipe a tear from his eye. "They're so beautiful I can hardly look at them."

links.title: You: ""What about the speakers though? Do..."
links.text: "What about the speakers though? Doesn't anyone want those speakers?"

links.title: Siileng: ""These, officer? These speakers are..."
links.text: "These, officer? These speakers are Samaran garbage. I'm ashamed to even use them for props. Don't waste your time on them."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Samaran trash? That sounds like the..."
links.text: Samaran trash? That sounds like they're from the Samaran People's Republic, produced under the dictatorship of the proletariat.

links.title: You: ""Poor little speakers." (Pat them.)"
links.text: "Poor little speakers." (Pat them.)

links.title: Siileng: ""No, don't pity them, officer! Thes..."
links.text: "No, don't pity them, officer! These are old Samaran garbage. Don't even look at them! Check out these super-cool FALN 'Ultras,' instead."

links.title: FALN Sneakers on a Pedestal of Speakers: "These once-respectable speakers hav..."
links.text: These once-respectable speakers have been conquered, reduced to a mere prop by the indomitable FALN 'Ultras' atop them.

links.title: You: ""Can't I just buy the sad, conquere..."
links.text: "Can't I just buy the sad, conquered Samaran speakers?"

links.title: Siileng: ""No way, officer, these aren't for..."
links.text: "No way, officer, these aren't for sale. They're bad speakers, low-fi socialist junk."

links.title: You: ""But I need some speakers.""
links.text: "But I need some speakers."

links.title: Siileng: ""Well, if you *want* them..." He pa..."
links.text: "Well, if you *want* them..." He pauses for a moment, calculating.

links.title: Siileng: ""On the one hand, these speakers ar..."
links.text: "On the one hand, these speakers are socialist garbage. On the *other* hand, you *did* buy the sneakers, so I don't really need them anymore..."

links.title: Siileng: ""Okay, officer, they're yours. For..."
links.text: "Okay, officer, they're yours. For 50 cents."

links.title: Siileng: ""But see, they are the pedestal for..."
links.text: "But see, they are the pedestal for my sneakers. If I let go of the speakers, where will the sneakers go? I can't leave premium lifestyle sneakers on the *ground*..."

links.title: Siileng: ""If, on the other hand, you wanted..."
links.text: "If, on the other hand, you wanted to buy the *sneakers*, too, I could maybe throw in the speakers for a little extra -- 50 cents."

links.title: Logic: "Damn, so you *have* to buy the snea..."
links.text: Damn, so you *have* to buy the sneakers first.

links.title: Logic: "Here's a crazy plan! Get the *seed..."
links.text: Here's a crazy plan! Get the *seed money* for the sneakers, buy them, then buy the speakers too. Then *sell* the speakers to Roy, that wacky vendor in the pawn shop. They're right up his alley. You'll make most of the sneakers money back that way.

links.title: You: "*I* came up with that plan?"
links.text: *I* came up with that plan?

links.title: Logic: "Yup. Hustle and grind, one re√°l at..."
links.text: Yup. Hustle and grind, one re√°l at a time.

links.title: You: "Silly idea, go away."
links.text: Silly idea, go away.

links.title: Logic: "Of course, yes. Better not risk it."
links.text: Of course, yes. Better not risk it.

links.title: You: ""That's why I want them. I think I..."
links.text: "That's why I want them. I think I might be low-fi socialist junk myself."

links.title: Siileng: ""No, officer, you're a high-class p..."
links.text: "No, officer, you're a high-class policeman who accepts nothing less than the best! Lucky for you, I've got the best on sale!"

links.title: You: ""You don't know what I am. I don't..."
links.text: "You don't know what I am. I don't even know it myself." (Pause). "I want the speakers."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what if I *do* deserve more..."
links.text: "Wait, what if I *do* deserve more than a low-fi socialist sound system..."

links.title: Siileng: ""You do, officer, you do! Remember..."
links.text: "You do, officer, you do! Remember -- we don't have to resort to socialism, we can have nice things too! At socialist *prices*." He pats the boxes tenderly.

links.title: You: ""You're right, I don't have time fo..."
links.text: "You're right, I don't have time for junk, I lead a luxury life."

links.title: Siileng: ""That's right, officer!" The street..."
links.text: "That's right, officer!" The street vendor flashes you a smile. "You're a high-class policeman who accepts nothing less than the best! Lucky for you, I've got the best on sale!"

links.title: You: ""I *need* those FALN sneakers.""
links.text: "I *need* those FALN sneakers."

links.title: Siileng: ""Super cool! Now the premium lifest..."
links.text: "Super cool! Now the premium lifestyle is yours, officer."

links.title: FALN Sneakers on a Pedestal of Speakers: "The sneakers seem to vibrate in you..."
links.text: The sneakers seem to vibrate in your hands with an almost mystical energy.

links.title: You: ""Okay, now let me buy the speakers.""
links.text: "Okay, now let me buy the speakers."

links.title: Siileng: ""The junk is yours, officer," the s..."
links.text: "The junk is yours, officer," the street vendor hands you the speakers. "Happy listening! Try not to hurt your ears with that Samaran garbage."

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: FALN Sneakers on a Pedestal of Speakers: "The speakers below are banged up an..."
dialogueTree.text: The speakers below are banged up and worthless. The sneakers triumph over them. They're the star of the show here.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "You should go over and ask him abou..."
links.text: You should go over and ask him about paying for those sneakers with your net worth.

dialogueTree.title: FALN Sneakers on a Pedestal of Speakers: "You see two lowly, defeated speaker..."
dialogueTree.text: You see two lowly, defeated speakers. Thralls, slaves basically. Perched atop them like conquerors surveying the land: a pair of FALN durable-wear sneakers, 'Ultra' series.

links.title: Siileng: ""I can see you've a taste for luxur..."
links.text: "I can see you've a taste for luxury, officer!" says the shopkeeper. "Can't keep your eyes off those sneakers?"

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Speaking of luxury, you should go o..."
links.text: Speaking of luxury, you should go over and ask about paying for those sneakers with your net worth.
